cast.overview: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both of them.
cast.title: The Banshees of Inisherin

details.biography:
Ryan is a Welsh actor, singer and multi-instrumentalist. His on-screen credits include the British film JUST JIM, BBC drama ABERFAN: THE GREEN HOLLOW which won the BAFTA Cymru Best Television Drama award and played the young Charlie Fairhead in CASUALTY.

On stage he wowed audiences at Theatr Clwyd in their rock n’ roll panto MOTHER GOOSE, going on to play the lead role of Jon in their stage adaptation of TICK, TICK…BOOM!  Ryan has also appeared in THE PRODUCERS, APPLAUSE, GEORGE’S MARVELLOUS MEDICINE, ALICE IN WONDERLAND and MY FAVOURITE YEAR and toured the UK in RAPUNZEL. Ryan trained at the London School of Music and is a highly skilled guitar player and pianist.
details.name: Ryan Owen
